contentrichtext.text: '''Vellimadukunnu''' is a place in the city of [[Kozhikode]] (Calicut) in [[Kozhikode District]], [[Kerala]] State, [[India]]. Vellimadukunnu is also known by the names Marikunnu. The post office of the surrounding area is also Named Marikkunnu. For a faster pronunciation some people use "vellyattummal". The meaning of vellimadukunnu (velli=silver, kunnu=hill, madu is referd to domestic animals like cow, buffellow, pig etc. it denotes earlier the hills were used for feeding animals grass.) is derived from word "Silver Hills". There is also a school in the same name situated near by vellimadukunnu. as the name implies the area have so many ups and downs on its geomatry. Vellimadukunnu is situated approximately 8-9 kilometers away from the city of Kozhikode. Vellimadukunnu is mainly a residential area and almost all the services and facilities like school, college, hospital, communication, etc. are available here. It is here the Juveniles home and the NGO quarters is situated.<ref>[http://kollam.nic.in/MissingChild-aug/kerala_juvenile_homes.asp Juvenile Homes in Kerala]</ref> Silver Hills School, a prestigious school, is situated here. The famous Nirmala Hospital and JDT Islam educational institution are also situated in vellimadukunnu. The area is mainly known by the bus stop which is on [[NH-212]] which connects [[kannur]] road and [[wayanad]] road. Earlier, it was a well known village and residential area in Calicut. But it is turning into a middle-urban area nowadays. A few main study institutes are owned by JDT which have introduced a Mosque and shopping complex in front of the school recently. There is an old joke in Malayalam about the pronunciation of the place. A drunken person reading the bus stop name He reads: “vella..madikunnu vazhi… marikkunnu” (People Die by drinking alcohol). The other residential areas under vellimadukunnu are mainly: puliyakkodukunnu, vappolithazam, Madhyamam, poolakkadavu stop, etc. ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== *[http://maps.google.co.in/maps?hl=en&ll=11.293946,75.820384&spn=0.01978,0.027509&z=15&vpsrc=6 view vellimadukunnu in map] {{coord|11.29395|N|75.82038|E|type:landmark_source:enwiki|display=title}} [[Category:Geography of Kerala]] {{Kozhikode-geo-stub}} [[ml:വെള്ളിമാട്‌കുന്ന്‌]]
